title: 4 Easy Ways to Delete or Deactivate Your TikTok Account

steps.title: Open TikTok on your phone or tablet.
steps.content: Open TikTok on your phone or tablet. You'll find its black and white music note icon on the home screen (iPhone/iPad) or in the app drawer (Android). If you proceed with deleting your account, you will lose access to all of your TikTok content. If you purchased items in the app, you will not be eligible for a refund. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the profile icon .
steps.content: Tap the profile icon . It's the outline of a person at the bottom-right corner of the screen. If you're not already signed in to your account , you'll be prompted to do so now.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . This is in the top-right corner. A menu will expand.

steps.title: Tap Settings and privacy.
steps.content: Tap Settings and privacy . This is in the pop-up menu.

steps.title: Tap Account.
steps.content: Tap Account . This is the first option underneath the Account header.

steps.title: Tap Deactivate or delete account.
steps.content: Tap Deactivate or delete account . You can find this at the very bottom.

steps.title: Tap Delete account permanently.
steps.content: Tap Delete account permanently . This is the second option. If you'd rather temporarily delete your account , you can select Deactivate account instead. While your account is deactivated, no one can see your account or content. You'll just need to log back in to reactivate it. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Select a reason and tap Next.
steps.content: Select a reason and tap Next . You can also tap Skip in the top-right corner.

steps.title: Tap the circle at the bottom and tap Continue.
steps.content: Tap the circle at the bottom and tap Continue . Before you delete your account, it's recommended to download your TikTok data since this can't be done afterwards. To download a copy of your data, tap Request download .

steps.title: Confirm the decision.
steps.content: Confirm the decision. You may be asked to tap Delete again and enter your account's password. Once you do, your TikTok account will be deleted. If you change your mind, log in before the 30-day period expires to reactivate your account.

steps.title: Ask others to help report your account.
steps.content: Ask others to help report your account. When an account is reported for being under the age of requirement, TikTok will delete it. To report an account, do the following: Go to the profile. Tap the Share button. Tap Report . Tap Report account . Select a reason. Tap Submit .

steps.title: Email TikTok to delete your account.
steps.content: Email TikTok to delete your account. If you no longer have access to your TikTok account, you can email TikTok support to delete your account. You may need to provide proof of ownership, such as the email used, date of birth, or other information. Contact TikTok on the official support website . You'll need an email address so they can respond back to you.

steps.title: Open TikTok on your phone or tablet.
steps.content: Open TikTok on your phone or tablet. You'll find its black and white music note icon on the home screen (iPhone/iPad) or in the app drawer (Android). If you plan to return to TikTok, you can deactivate your account temporarily. This will hide your account and content without permanently deleting it.

steps.title: Tap the profile icon .
steps.content: Tap the profile icon . It's the outline of a person at the bottom-right corner of the screen. If you're not already signed in to your account , you'll be prompted to do so now.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . This is in the top-right corner.

steps.title: Tap Settings and privacy.
steps.content: Tap Settings and privacy . This is in the pop-up menu.

steps.title: Tap Account.
steps.content: Tap Account . This is the first option underneath the Account header.

steps.title: Tap Deactivate or delete account.
steps.content: Tap Deactivate or delete account . You can find this at the very bottom.

steps.title: Tap Deactivate account.
steps.content: Tap Deactivate account . This is the second option.

steps.title: Tap Deactivate.
steps.content: Tap Deactivate . This is the red button.

steps.title: Confirm the code.
steps.content: Confirm the code. In order to deactivate your account, you'll be asked to enter the code sent to the email address registered to your account.

steps.title: Tap Deactivate account again.
steps.content: Tap Deactivate account again. Your TikTok account will be deactivated. When you're ready to activate your account again, simply log into your account.
